name: Fruit Splash (itch) (DanielBoldrin)
description:
Simple Match 3 game using fruits made for the Juicy Jam #1
Jam Main theme: Luck
Jam Secondary theme: Surveillance.
Jam goal: Make the juiciest game

You must match at least 3 colors by clicking on the 2 pieces you want to change.
Controls: Mouse Click.

The game has a level creator that allows you to change most settings and a random level generator.

There are 3 pre-made levels with escalating difficulty.

All code was made during the Jam by me.
I want to thank Simon Aublet for the free 2D assets I used, available here:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/fruitface-animated-ui-pack-58...
All sound effects and songs were downloaded copywright-free.
